about_the_game:
Description:

Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars is a brand new, immersive and captivating multiplayer online survival game set in a mythical medieval world. Developed by StarterCube Development, this game promises to transport players to a world filled with mystery and wonder, where they'll embark on a journey to survive and thrive in a fantasy world full of danger and excitement.

In Igrerea, players will be able to explore a vast and stunningly detailed world, filled with diverse environments ranging from forests and caves to towering castles and magical ruins. With a focus on immersion and experience, Igrerea offers a truly unique and memorable gaming experience, where players will be able to interact with their environment and other players in a way that feels seamless and authentic.

Whether you're a seasoned MMO veteran or a newcomer to the genre, Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars offers something for everyone. With its deep crafting and building systems, intense combat and PvP battles, and a rich social environment, this game is designed to keep you engaged for hours on end. So, gather your friends and embark on an unforgettable adventure in the Land Above the Stars!

Features:

Physics Based Player:

Introducing the latest addition to your virtual reality gaming experience - our physics-based player. Designed to bring a new level of realism to your VR adventures, this player allows you to physically interact with the game world as if you were really there. Whether you're jumping, ducking, or climbing, the physics-based player will respond in real-time, making your movements feel smooth and natural.

With this player, you'll experience a level of immersion like never before, as you interact with objects and environments that feel tangible and responsive. The player's physics engine has been meticulously designed to replicate real-world motion and reactions, so you'll be able to perform actions such as jumping and grabbing with ease. And with its advanced collision detection system, you'll never have to worry about clipping through objects or getting stuck in walls.

Whether you're exploring a new world, battling enemies, or solving puzzles, the physics-based player will bring a level of realism to your VR experiences that will make you feel like you're actually there. So if you're looking to take your VR gaming to the next level, try out this exciting new player today!


Naval Sytem:

​In Igrerea, the Land Above the Stars, players can now experience the thrill of a sea-faring adventure with the new physics-based naval system. Navigate the game's vast oceans, rivers, and lakes with unparalleled realism, as your ships respond to the movement of the waves and winds in real time.

The physics-based naval system has been designed to provide a truly immersive experience, with realistic ship movements, responsive sails and rudders, and accurate physics-based buoyancy. Sail your ship through rough seas and treacherous storms, or enjoy a leisurely journey on calm waters, as the physics engine accurately replicates the motion of your ship.

With this new system, battles at sea are more intense than ever before. Engage in naval battles with rival players or fearsome sea monsters, using your ship's weapons and the environment to gain an advantage. The system's advanced collision detection means you'll feel the impact of every shot fired, making every battle feel like a true test of your seafaring skills.

So, gather your crew and set sail in Igrerea, the Land Above the Stars, for an unforgettable adventure on the high seas. With the physics-based naval system, the ocean is yours to explore and conquer!

Town Building:

In Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars, players can now build entire civilizations from the ground up, thanks to the revolutionary town construction and dynamic building system. This system provides players with the tools to create their own thriving settlements, complete with houses, inns, shops, and other structures, all while retaining the dynamic feel of a living and breathing world.

With this new system, the building is easier and more intuitive than ever before. Players can easily place structures, create roads and paths, and build intricate fortifications to protect their towns from invaders. And with the system's dynamic building feature, your town will grow and evolve as you play, with buildings and structures dynamically changing over time to reflect your choices and actions.

But the town construction and dynamic building system in Igrerea is more than just a building tool. It's also an opportunity to create and customize your own unique civilization, one that reflects your playstyle and reflects your personality. From the architecture and layout of your buildings to the placement of roads and paths, every decision you make will shape your town in a unique way.

So, gather your resources, recruit your workers, and start building your own thriving civilization in Igrerea, the Land Above the Stars. With this powerful and flexible system, the possibilities are endless!

Blacksmithing:

In Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars, players can now bring their own unique touch to their equipment with the in-depth blacksmithing system. This system allows players to forge their own custom weapons and armor, combining various pieces and materials to create truly unique and personalized pieces.

The blacksmithing system is intuitive and easy to use, allowing players to experiment with different combinations of materials and shapes to create truly one-of-a-kind equipment. Whether you're looking for a powerful sword for battle, or a lightweight set of armor for exploring, the blacksmithing system has everything you need to bring your vision to life.

But the blacksmithing system in Igrerea is more than just a crafting tool. It's also a key component of the game's deep progression system, allowing players to unlock new materials and recipes as they progress through the game. With each new discovery, players can create even more powerful and unique equipment, giving them an edge in combat and exploration.

So, gather your resources, fire up the forge, and start creating your own custom weapons and armor in Igrerea, the Land Above the Stars. With this deep and flexible blacksmithing system, the possibilities are endless!

World Events:

In Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars, players are never short on things to do, thanks to the endless and engaging custom-made world events. Whether you're looking for an epic battle against a powerful enemy, or a more peaceful challenge like a trading competition, Igrerea has something for everyone.

The world events in Igrerea are designed to be dynamic and ever-changing, providing players with a constant stream of new and exciting challenges. From public quests that require cooperation from multiple players to personal events that are tailored to your individual playstyle, there's always something new to discover.

These events are carefully crafted to provide players with a truly immersive experience, offering a glimpse into the rich lore and history of the game world. With a range of events to choose from, players can dive into action-packed battles, embark on epic journeys, and explore new territories, all while progressing through the game and unlocking new rewards.

So, gather your friends, sharpen your skills, and prepare for an endless stream of exciting world events in Igrerea, the Land Above the Stars. With this dynamic and engaging system, the adventure never ends!

Diverse Weather:

​In Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars, players can experience the full range of weather conditions, from the calm serenity of a sunny day to the wrath of a raging storm, thanks to the immersive and detailed weather system. This system brings the game world to life, providing players with a truly dynamic and believable environment.

With a wide range of weather conditions to choose from, including both real-world and fantasy weather types, the weather system in Igrerea is both diverse and believable. From the gentle mist of light rain to the fury of a full-blown thunderstorm, the weather in Igrerea is constantly changing, providing players with a sense of realism that is unmatched by other games.

But the weather system in Igrerea is more than just an atmospheric effect. It also has a deep and meaningful impact on gameplay, with different weather conditions affecting different aspects of the game world. For example, heavy rain can make traveling through the wilderness more difficult, while a sunny day may make it easier to spot enemies from a distance.

So, brace yourself for the elements and experience the full range of weather conditions in Igrerea, the Land Above the Stars. With this immersive and detailed weather system, you'll never experience a dull moment in the game world!
detailed_description:
Roadmap

Exciting news, Igrerea fans!

We are proud to announce that our highly anticipated in-development fantasy VR game, Igrerea, will be launching as a single-player survival game. This is just the first step towards our ultimate goal of bringing you a massive multiplayer online (MMO) experience.

While we know that many of you were eager to jump into the multiplayer aspect of the game, starting as a single-player survival game will allow us to refine and perfect the game mechanics, graphics, and overall gameplay.

Fear not, we have an ambitious roadmap in place and will be continuously updating the game to bring you the full Igrerea experience. We are dedicated to creating the best possible gaming experience for you and can't wait for you to join us on this exciting journey.

Stay tuned for more updates and we hope to see you in the game soon!


Early Beta Access

Greetings Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars fans!

If you're looking for the latest news and updates on Igrerea, we have great news for you! We've created a dedicated Discord community where you can connect with fellow fans, get exclusive insights from the development team, and stay up-to-date on all things Igrerea.

Joining our Discord community is easy, simply follow this link . Once you're a member, you'll have access to all the latest information, including development updates, sneak peeks, and much more.

We can't wait for you to join the conversation and be a part of the Igrerea community. See you on Discord!


About the Game

name: Igrerea: The Land Above the Stars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Equivalent or Greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 Equivalent or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 Equivalent or Greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 980 / AMD Radeon™ R9 380 Equivalent or Greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Igrerea is a fantasy, medieval, survival game that will take you on an immersive journey through a magical world. With its focus on creating a rich and engaging experience,
